price: Aane, nokorε sε na ne Wura Nyankopͻn hu no (abrε biara).
arabic: بَلَىٰٓۚ إِنَّ رَبَّهُۥ كَانَ بِهِۦ بَصِيرٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: balā inna rabbahu kāna bihi baṣīran
